Product.Title: Sautés for Two™ Braised Beef and Portobello Tortelloni
Product.Description: Braised prime rib steak and portobello mushroom tortelloni with spinach, diced tomatoes, and portobello mushrooms in a Marsala wine sauce.

Product.Title: Sautés for Two™ Cajun-Style Shrimp Alfredo
Product.Description: Shrimp and stozzapreti pasta with red peppers, green onion and diced tomatoes in a spicy Alfredo sauce.

Product.Title: Sautés for Two™ Chicken Bacon Alfredo
Product.Description: Grilled white meat chicken and pasta tossed with peas and asparagus in a Parmesan cream sauce with bacon.

Product.Title: Sautés for Two™ Grilled Chicken and Asiago Tortelloni
Product.Description: Grilled white meat chicken with cheese tortelloni and spinach tossed in a rich Alfredo cream sauce.

Product.Title: Sautés for Two™ Steak Gorgonzola
Product.Description: Prime rib steak and penne pasta with roasted red peppers and sun-dried tomatoes tossed in an Alfredo gorgonzola sauce.
